Downloadable data about the philippines

  • Data about earthquakes in the Philippines may be downloaded from the US Geological Survey
  • Data about typhoons in the Philippines may be downloaded from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration
  • Shapefiles to create Philippine maps in RDSmay be downloaded from the GADM.org
